job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Force-X is seeking a Software Engineer for our client in Suwanee, GA. This is a full-time, Direct Hire position.
QUALIFICATIONS:
Requires at least 1 year relevant experience.
Must be a US person (US citizen or Green Card)
Adaptable, Flexible, Ability to Learn – must be able to work with different architecture and software
Experience with creative problem-solving – must be able to overcome obstacles with a unique perspective to benefit the team
Team Player – must be able to accept a role in a team and work well together, sharing goals, effort, and not afraid to ask for assistance
Experience with C++ and C# programming.
Experience with 3D software development (Gaming, Simulation, or Commercial) – experience in using modern 3D development software and understanding of engine-related optimization, limitation, and strengths.
Experience with object-oriented and component-oriented programming.
Experience with database management – interfacing with a database to external software for handling large amounts of save/load, and data management
Experience of programing with 3rd party SDK and API – utilizing 3rd party hardware and software
Experience with Unity – as well as packages, C#, and prefab management
EDUCATION:
Engineering degree in computer science or relevant field
